original_solution_mapping.L1: At a germination rate of 60%, 25 seeds will yield 60/100*25=<<60/100*25=15>>15 plants.
original_solution_mapping.L2: At a germination rate of 80%, 25 seeds will yield 80/100*25=<<80/100*25=20>>20 plants.
original_solution_mapping.L3: In total, she will have grown 15+20=<<15+20=35>>35 plants.
original_solution_mapping.L4: If 80% of the plants developed flowers, then she will have grown (80/100)*35=<<(80/100)*35=28>>28 plants that produce flowers.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 1550.
    Returns: the number of plants that will produce flowers.
    """
    # L1
    daisy_germination_rate = Fraction(60, 100) # 60% of the daisy seeds germinate
    daisy_seeds_planted = 25 # planted 25 daisy seeds
    germinated_daisy_plants = daisy_germination_rate * daisy_seeds_planted

    # L2
    sunflower_germination_rate = Fraction(80, 100) # 80% of the sunflower seeds germinate
    sunflower_seeds_planted = 25 # 25 sunflower seeds
    germinated_sunflower_plants = sunflower_germination_rate * sunflower_seeds_planted

    # L3
    total_germinated_plants = germinated_daisy_plants + germinated_sunflower_plants

    # L4
    flower_production_rate = Fraction(80, 100) # 80% of the resulting plants produce flowers
    plants_producing_flowers = flower_production_rate * total_germinated_plants

    # FA
    answer = plants_producing_flowers
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: At a germination rate of {daisy_germination_rate}, {daisy_seeds_planted} seeds will yield {daisy_germination_rate}*{daisy_seeds_planted}=<<{daisy_germination_rate}*{daisy_seeds_planted}={germinated_daisy_plants}>>{germinated_daisy_plants} plants.

At a germination rate of {sunflower_germination_rate}, {sunflower_seeds_planted} seeds will yield {sunflower_germination_rate}*{sunflower_seeds_planted}=<<{sunflower_germination_rate}*{sunflower_seeds_planted}={germinated_sunflower_plants}>>{germinated_sunflower_plants} plants.

In total, she will have grown {germinated_daisy_plants}+{germinated_sunflower_plants}=<<{germinated_daisy_plants}+{germinated_sunflower_plants}={total_germinated_plants}>>{total_germinated_plants} plants.

If {flower_production_rate} of the plants developed flowers, then she will have grown ({flower_production_rate})*{total_germinated_plants}=<<({flower_production_rate})*{total_germinated_plants}={plants_producing_flowers}>>{plants_producing_flowers} plants that produce flowers.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: At a germination rate of 60/100, 25 seeds will yield 60/100*25=<<60/100*25=15>>15 plants.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: At a germination rate of 80/100, 25 seeds will yield 80/100*25=<<80/100*25=20>>20 plants.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: In total, she will have grown 15+20=<<15+20=35>>35 plants.

explanation: Incorrect final answer. An intermediate value 'total_germinated_plants' (value: 35) was reported instead of 'plants_producing_flowers' (value: 28).
